content: casual cozy easy to wear - who doesn t love a good hoodie inspired by the comfort and casualness of a sweatshirt hoodie this easy to knit cowl has a drawstring hood that cinches closed to keep out the cold knit with two colors or one the unisex styling means it s great for the whole family the cowl and hood are knit flat and then seamed the cowl and hood can be knit in the same color or in different colors for a hip look this easy level pattern makes a great addition to any knitters repertoire and can easily be adjusted for kids sizes or even dogs uses approximately 370 yards of bulky weight yarn
